page.title: 15Crops in the Ashey area
page.content: The most noticeable crop is the {oilseed rape}which covers the fields with bright yellow flowers. It is a forage crop. We also found considerable areas of grass,mostly pasture but some would become a{hay}crop in early Summer. Some of the fields were sown with cereals.We expect these would be {barley,wheat and oats}which would be harvested in the late Summer. Some of the{woodland}also appeared to be being cut down and we were told of a new sawmill being started in Rowlands Lane.It is only a clearing at the moment.
